类 MappedVertexLayout

java.lang.Object
org.overrun.swgl.core.model.VertexLayout
org.overrun.swgl.core.model.MappedVertexLayout
public class MappedVertexLayout extends VertexLayout
The VertexLayout, with element name and value mapping.
从以下版本开始:
0.1.0
作者:
squid233

    • MappedVertexLayout

      public MappedVertexLayout(Object... kvs)
      Construct the layout with key-values.
      参数:
      kvs - The key-values. The length must be an even number.

      The elements are in order with: Object, VertexFormat, Object, VertexFormat...
